name: Cheirosa '59 Perfume Mist
categories: Fragrance, Women, Body Mist & Hair Mist
about: Fragrance Family:Warm & Spicy.Scent Type:Warm & Sweet Gourmands.Key Notes:Sugared Violet, Vanilla Orchid, and Sandalwood.Fragrance Description:Uplifting and delicious, this enticing scent is scientifically shown to boost your mood.* Immerse your body and mind with notes of vanilla orchid, sugared violet, and sheer sandalwood..About the Fragrance:This fragrance captures the emotion of winding down after a perfect beach day. Evocative notes are elevated with exquisite florals, while juicy plum brings a bold, creamy touch.u2014Jerome Epinette
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Aqua (Water, Eau), Parfum (Fragrance), Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Hydroxycitronellal.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Spritz from head to toeu2014anytime and anywhere. .-May cause compliments...Recycling Instructions: .-Recycle the bottle and cap and discard the pump.    ..Optional:.-Clean well and upcycle your empty bottle for that next DIY project. .-Sol de Janeiro suggests filling with water and misting houseplants.

reviews.review_text: I bought this product in store. I fell in love at first sight (or smell if you want to be technical)! reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Cheirosa '59 is my favorite SDJ scent. I think that the '62 scent smells like nutty sunscreen (which is not bad, but I do not want to smell like that on a daily basis, and definitely not in the winter), '71 smells like buttered popcorn (I do not want to smell like buttered popcorn), and Beija Flor smells like a fruity cleaning product.  '59 is a very cozy and inviting scent. It may even put you to sleep--not because it's boring, but because it's like a lullaby. If you want a scent that will relax you, this is the one. '59 is a sweet evening walk in the garden, whereas the other SDJ smells are very life-of-the-party: exhausting.  If I were to do a bit of creative writing about this smell...well, consider the following situation: you have baked a fragrant vanilla cake in your kitchen, and you left the window open. It is a slightly damp but cool and pleasant night outside. You go outside from the kitchen to a wooden porch, where you are surrounded by night-blooming jasmine. You take a deep whiff of moist, cool air. You can still smell the cake in your kitchen. That's what wearing '59 feels like.  Pros: Inoffensive and lovely. Great for layering. Lingers in hair and clothes.  Cons: It's a body spray and not a perfume. It has weirdly good staying power for a body spray.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a big fan of the SDJ fragrances and this one is undoubtedly my favorite so far! I just purchased the larger size of it, I just love this scent so much. It's a very easy to wear scent, very musky and sweet with some vanilla (without going into the edible direction) almost a little bit powdery, but in the best way. It is not as youthful as let's say 68, but is still fun and playful. I feel like someone of any age could wear this fragrance when they just want to feel sweet and playful and delicious. This layers SO WELL with some of my other vanilla/musky/amber fragrances and when combined with the body butter...stunning. It lasts about 5 hours on my skin (6+ when combined with the body butter) which I feel like is really good for a body mist.

reviews.review_text: The day after I bought this perfume, I walked into my husband's office, to which he immediately complimented me, saying 'You smell so beautiful.' I love using these Sol de Janeiro body mists for day-to-day use to avoid wasting my more expensive perfumes. I've tried every single scent of theirs, but this one is truly *chef's kiss.* It's such a subtle yet beautiful scent, like a fruit/melon salad with whipped cream, and it really smells more expensive than it is. This is truly my new favorite scent.

reviews.review_text: This smells like very faint cupcakes in the best way possible! Itu2019s definitely the sweetest of all the SDJ sprays compared to their usual floral scents. I would say itu2019s a little bit earthy as well. I spray around 4-5 times in the morning and it tends to go away after a few hours so you just have to respray. Itu2019s definitely low concentrated which can be annoying if you donu2019t want to carry around the bottle all day. Overall, if you want a perfume thatu2019s a perfect balance of sweet and earthy then BUY THIS!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This smells so addictively good!  It's a plummy candied vanilla--but it's on the warm side.  It's super cozy and smells a bit edible.  The only downside is that the scent doesn't last very long.  The body cream is also amazing.  The scent of the cream lasts longer.  I love wearing the two and then adding Kylie's new Cosmic perfume.  Cosmic doesn't smell the same as '59 but they smell really nice together--sweet and pretty.  Cosmic also doesn't have great staying power.  Le sigh

reviews.review_text: smells amazing!! it smells like vanilla, and it isnt like a floral or fruity smell at all. it is great to spray on ur body and in ur hair! i also have the full sizes of 40, 72, and rio radiance. i literally love all of them!!

reviews.review_title: Unique, sweet scent! Very enjoyable and strong
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I actually really like this product! Itu2019s an amazing scent, unique and feels luxurious. Itu2019s obviously very different to 62, being not as nutty and gourmand. However, itu2019s a very sweet but also a smooth and soft vanilla with hints of orchids. It also smells a bit like candy in my opinion. I find itu2019s very long lasting compared to the other SDJ sprays! However sometimes when I first spray it, it feels overwhelming for a little bit because of the potency which I donu2019t normally experience, but the overwhelming sensation doesnu2019t last long for me. It just maybe something to keep in mind if youu2019re sensitive to scents! Overall 9/10!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a few of the sol de Janeiro body mists, this oneu2019s definitely one of my favourites. I always get compliments when I wear it. they donu2019t last all day, but thatu2019s to be expected as a body mist!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is my FAVORITE perfume mist of all time. i used to shop at bath & body works but their perfumes didn't last very long. sol de janeiro came out with their new perfumes but i never tried them. this is the first one i decided to try very recently and i use it everyday. it smells so good & i get so many compliments on it! it lasts pretty long as well, i usually put it on once in the morning & then if i go out i will add a bit more. its very girly but mature smelling. no floral smell, very vanilla/sandlewoody but not like the usual boring vanilla scents that are put out there. i love the bigger size of the bottle too, i feel its well worth the price. buy this product!!!!
